channel.title: #176: Tips for self-publishing a book, with science fiction writer Aidan Doyle
channel.description:
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/3c281086-ba0d-4907-9d65-0fc73817f4c2?dark=false"></iframe>
Aidan Doyle is a science fiction writer. Amongst his work are two self-published books, including The Writer's Book of Doubt. I'm planning to produce a book later this year as a marketing endeavour for Feature Upvote. So I chatted with Aidan to get tips on how to do this well.
* [Aidan's website](https://www.aidandoyle.net/) * [Aidan on Twitter](https://twitter.com/aidan_doyle) * [The Writer's Book of Doubt](https://www.aidandoyle.net/books/the-writers-book-of-doubt/)
[You can also download, listen and subscribe here](https://bootstrapped.fm/176-tips-for-self-publishing-a-book-with-science-fiction-writer-aidan-doyle/).
